A DVD of THE GODFATHER PART II (1974) was classified M (Violence, themes & coarse language) in 2008. A new submission, for public exhibition, has resulted in it being increased to MA15+ (Strong themes & violence). The M-rating has been held since its original theatrical release. https://t.co/azAWBARdbZ
